court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 1172/2018 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -II,HOSDURG CRIME NO.483/2011 OF Bekal Police Station , Kasaragod PETITIONER/ACCUSED : SATHEESHAN .M AGED 34 YEARS S/O. NARAYANAN, KAPPA
full_text: Pirie El El? 4 te 2020/KER/413 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.4927 OF 2019 (E) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 1172/2018 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -II,HOSDURG CRIME NO.483/2011 OF Bekal Police Station , Kasaragod PETITIONER/ACCUSED : SATHEESHAN .M AGED 34 YEARS S/O. NARAYANAN, KAPPANAKKAL HOUSE, KUNIYA AYAMBARA ROAD, PERIA VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SMT . HEMALATHA SRI.BINU GEORGE RESPONDENTS/STATE/DE FACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031 2 BHARATHAN, AGED 44 YEARS S/O. NARAYANAN, R./AT KAPPANAKKAL, NEAR PLYWOOD COMPANY, KUNIYA, PERIA VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT 671 315 R2 BY ADV. K.P.ANTONY BINU SRI. C.S.HRITHWIK, SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2020/KER/413 Crl.MC.No.4927 OF 2019 (E) 2 ORDER Dated this the 7th day of January 2020 The petitioner is the 2 accused in Crime No.483/2011 of Bekal Police Station, for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 448, 341, 323, 324 r/w Section 34 of the IPC. There were two more accused and the case against them proceeded and ended in acquittal. The petitioner was absconding and hence, this case was split up and refiled as CC No.1172/2018 on the files of Judicial First Class Magistrate-II, Hosdurg. 2. The defacto complainant and injured is the 2 respondent, who has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioner and that he has no grievance against the petitioner. A report has been called for from the Investigating Officer 2020/KER/413 Crl.MC.No.4927 OF 2019 (E) 3 through the senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioner does not have any criminal antecedents. There is no public interest involved. In the result the Crl.M.C is allowed, and the entire proceedings against the petitioner in CC No.1172/2018 on the file of Judicial First Class Magistrate-II, Hosdurg, stands quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.P.C and the accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE SPK BERET Peat OE: 4 ie 2020/KER/413 Cr1.MC.No.4927 OF 2019(E) 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF FIR IN CRIME NO. 483/2011 OF BEKAL POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 483/2011 OF BEKAL POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A3 AFFIDAVIT DATED 6/07/2019 SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE COPY// PA TO JUDGE
